body.name: K’NEX – 35 Model Building Set – 480 Pieces – For Ages 7+ Construction Education Toy (Amazon Exclusive)

features: CLASSIC PIECES – This building set comes with 480 classic K’NEX parts and pieces. It includes rods and connectors that are attached to one another in different ways, allowing kids to unleash their creativity and skills in designing a variety of shapes, figures, and models. The snap-fit pieces stick together securely and can be easily reassembled into other creations.

REAL MOVING PARTS – Unlike other building toys, K’NEX lets builders create different models that actually move. This building set allows them to make interactive toys and figures like trucks, airplanes, helicopters, and auto parts such as wheels, wings, rotors, and tracks. Constructing your own buildings, amusement park rides, and bridges isn’t just a dream when you have this building set!

CONVENIENT STORAGE – It can be a problem to store small plastic toy parts into one place, and the last thing you want is them getting lost! Keep all the K’NEX parts in one place that is easy to access. Store all those precious pieces in this handy treasure chest that kids will always love to open. Packaging may vary.

VERSATILE – K’NEX 35 Model Building Set includes an instruction booklet that shows builders how to create 35 unique models with its step-by-step guidelines. This toy is ideal for kids ages 7 and above, allowing them to create anything that their minds can come up with. Watch your kids’ imaginations grow through the sheer amount of models they can make with the K’NEX 35 Model Building Set.
body.description: Fuel your children’s imaginations and unleash their creativity with K’NEX 35 Model Building SetThe set comes with 480 K’NEX parts and pieces in a mix of classic and micro sized parts It includes rods and connectors that attach to one another in different ways, allowing kids to hone their artistic skills by coming up with a variety of shapes, figures, and models. The snap-fit pieces stick together securely and can be easily reassembled into other creations.K’NEX lets builders create different models that actually move. This building set allows them to make interactive toys and models like trucks, airplanes, helicopters, and auto parts such as wheels, wings, rotors, and tracks. Constructing your own buildings, amusement park rides, and bridges isn’t just a dream when you have this building set!Furthermore, this set improves kids’ STEAM (science, technology, engineering, arts, and math) capabilities by inspiring their natural curiosity and creativity, which powers the fun of each and every K’NEX building set. K’NEX supports key areas of children’s development. As they click the parts together and discover how the building system works, they strengthen their hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, problem-solving skills, and spatial awareness! It can be a problem to store small plastic toy parts into one place, and the last thing you want is them getting lost! Keep all the K’NEX parts in one place that is easy to access. Store all those precious pieces in this handy treasure chest that kids will always love to open..K’NEX 35 Model Building Set includes an instruction booklet that shows builders how to create 35 unique models with its step-by-step guidelines. This toy is ideal for kids ages 7 and up, allowing them to make anything their minds can come up with. Enhance your children’s imaginations with the sheer amount of models they can create with the K’NEX 35 Model Building Set.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The snap-fit pieces stick together securely and can be easily reassembled into other creations.K'NEX lets builders create different models that actually move. This building set allows them to make interactive toys and models like trucks, airplanes, helicopters, and auto parts such as wheels, wings, rotors, and tracks. K'NEX 35 Model Building Set includes an instruction booklet that shows builders how to create 35 unique models with its step-by-step guidelines. K’NEX – 35 Model Building Set – 480 Pieces – For Ages 7+ Construction Education Toy Fuel your children's imaginations and unleash their creativity with K'NEX 35 Model Building Set. The set comes with 480 K'NEX parts and pieces in a mix of classic and micro sized parts. It includes rods and connectors that attach to one another in different ways, allowing kids to hone their artistic skills by coming up with a variety of shapes, figures, and models. Includes 480 K'NEX micro and classic pieces allowing kids to unleash their creativity to design a variety of models. Build trucks, airplanes, helicopters, or whatever you can imagine! Set comes with an easy-to-follow instruction manual. Ideal for kids 7 and up. K'NEX supports the developmental growth of hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, problem-solving skills, & spatial awareness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great K’nex set for the money!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set for the money. You get 480 pieces in this set. The best thing is these sets work with others so you can combine them to make bigger construction models. It really challenges the minds and imagination which is very important in this day and time for children who mostly spend their time on video games and tv. It is good quality. There are a lot of small pieces so need to get a storage bin to keep everything organized especially if you are combining with other K’nex sets. Would definitely recommend this for all ages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You just can't go wrong with these building. Connects kids. Love to build

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still the best
reviews.reviewText: Still one of the best STEM toys out there! my 6yr old is creating so many things with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Given as a Christmas gift. Was liked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter's science fair project for her to make a cube. While the blocks themselves are great there are not enough pieces to make a decent size cube. You can really only build from their catalog as that is how the pieces for the set are determined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for kids!
reviews.reviewText: This is just as fun as legos!! It gives you different building specs to do or you can build whatever you like!! My son loves this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excel te regalo para mi hijo de 7 años. Le encantó

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars So fun BUT missing pieces.
reviews.reviewText: As we’re trying to build the Ferris wheel we see we’re missing several key components. Along with a couple others. A little bit of a letdown there.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great gift for a 6 year old.
reviews.reviewText: Gift for a 6 year old. Was a hit.
con un pò di aiuto i bambini riescono a costruire oggetti carini . A mio avviso è un gioco educativo ma non idoneo per bambini sotto i 7/8 anni

reviews.reviewTitle: Llego a tiempo y bien empaquetado
reviews.reviewText: Para regalo de un nieto, gusto mucho
